title: Finny.pro terms of use

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This website is owned and operated by Finny LLC and provides an online platform for tracking and managing personal budgets. By accessing and using the website, you agree to be bound by the following terms of use.

account-creation.title: 2. Account Creation
account-creation.content: To use the website's services, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the account registration process, and keep your account information up-to-date. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for any activity that occurs under your account.

proprietary-rights.title: 3. Proprietary Rights
proprietary-rights.content: All content on the website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Finny LLC or its licensors, and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, publish, sell, license, create derivative works, or use any content for commercial or public purposes.

use-of-service.title: 4. Use of Service
use-of-service.content: You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with the terms of use. You shall not use the website to upload, post, transmit, or otherwise make available any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, tortuous, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable. You shall not interfere with or disrupt the website or servers or networks connected to the website, or disobey any requirements, procedures, policies, or regulations of networks connected to the website.

limitation-of-liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
limitation-of-liability.content: Finny LLC and its affiliates, partners, licensors, and suppliers shall not be liable for any damages, including without limitation, direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the website or its services.

termination-of-service.title: 6. Termination of Service
termination-of-service.content: Finny LLC reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate or suspend your access to the website or its services, with or without notice and with or without cause, at any time.

changes-to-terms-of-use.title: 7. Changes to Terms of Use
changes-to-terms-of-use.content: Finny LLC reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify the terms of use at any time. Your continued use of the website following the posting of any changes to the terms of use constitutes acceptance of those changes.

entire-agreement.title: 8. Entire Agreement
entire-agreement.content: The terms of use constitute the entire agreement between you and Finny LLC with respect to the use of the website, and supersede all prior agreements and understandings, whether written or oral, between the parties.

afterword: By using the Budget Tracking Website, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms of use, do not use the website.
